name: Magical Mysterious Machine
description:
A seagull fighting off hordes of strange magical creatures? More likely than you think.

In this game you must protect a magical machine from getting destroyed by the enemies. You must always be looking out for enemies because they are coming for you very fast. There are also boss waves where you have to defend against way stronger enemies.

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot

NOTE: when you retry press pause to unfreeze.

Player, enemies, machine, and a few other assets are made by me. Others are from OpenGameArt.
Code by me. Music from OpenGameArt. Sound effects made with jsfxr.
